title: Help Your Child Develop True Confidence
itunes:author: Michael Anderson & Dr. Timothy Johanson
itunes:summary:
John and Danny describe the most important life skills to teach your child. Featuring Michael Anderson and Dr. Timothy Johanson. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

GIST: The Essence of Raising Life-Ready Kids: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-24?refcd=1019405

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/help-your-child-develop-true-confidence/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
